name: Telegram bot
description: A Normal Telegram Bot Which can download and upload files from txt file with extra features

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather, and enter it's api token here.

OWNER.description: Get ur Id Of Telegram nd Paste Here.

SKELETON_URL.description: Put URL of your streaming app without the '/' at end

AUTH_GROUPS.description: ID of the Groups with a space in between

AUTH_USERS.description: ID of the Users with a space in between
